ops.description: Bank[6][9] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // “This door is stuck wide open.
Better fix this right away.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // “This door is stuck wide open.
Better fix this right away.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // “{Aeris}?
How did you know that name?
You must be…”{PAUSE}“{Aeris},
you mean that kid.
The receptionist? I was
startin' to worry about her, too.”{PAUSE}“And so another rival
appears on the scene, eh?”{PAUSE}“You mean, she's not?
It's someone else?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // “Oh, I see.
So you must be
that whatcha call it…”{PAUSE}“Shinra, Inc. Repair Division!!”{PAUSE}“You know, this building
looks like it's
starting to fall apart.”{PAUSE}“This door was just pushed open.
You ought to fix this right away.”{PAUSE}“Oh yeah, and take a look
on the other floors, too.
Here, take this.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:6}); // “This is the lounge floor.
Above us are the special floors for
the company big wigs.”{PAUSE}“It's tough working under someone.
It wears you out.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:8}); // “No idea.
But no need to worry because
everything above the
60th floor is safe.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:8}); // “No idea.
But no need to worry because
everything above the
60th floor is safe.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:7}); // “I thought I heard a ruckus
downstairs a minute ago.
Do you know what that was all about?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:7}); // “I thought I heard a ruckus
downstairs a minute ago.
Do you know what that was all about?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:9}); // “What's keeping her?
Did she forget her keycard?”{PAUSE}“Even employees can't access floors
above the 60th
without a keycard.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:12}); // “Wipe that stupid look off your face.
I was only going to teach you
how to get to the next floor.”{PAUSE}“The higher ups in the company
use the floors above the 60th floor.
But you can't get there without
a keycard.”{PAUSE}“Get a keycard and you can use
the elevators freely.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:13}); // “…voila!
Hear that sound and
the door will open.”{PAUSE}“Just remember there are
different types of cards.
One keycard alone won't
let you go everywhere.”{PAUSE}“For example,{PAUSE}“'Keycard 60' only takes
you to the 60th floor.
'Keycard 65' only takes
you to the 65th floor.”{PAUSE}“It's a security system worthy of
Shinra. After all, they control
everything in Midgar and in the
world for that matter.”{PAUSE}“Oh, I have to go.
Gotta get back to work!”

ops.raw: d0 46 ff 1e fc 00 00 b7 ff 1e fc 00 00

dialogStrings:
“The hell are you?
What're you doin' around here?”
{CHOICE}Where's {Aeris}?
{CHOICE}…

“{Aeris}?
How did you know that name?
You must be…”{PAUSE}“{Aeris},
you mean that kid.
The receptionist? I was
startin' to worry about her, too.”{PAUSE}“And so another rival
appears on the scene, eh?”{PAUSE}“You mean, she's not?
It's someone else?”

“Oh, I see.
So you must be
that whatcha call it…”{PAUSE}“Shinra, Inc. Repair Division!!”{PAUSE}“You know, this building
looks like it's
starting to fall apart.”{PAUSE}“This door was just pushed open.
You ought to fix this right away.”{PAUSE}“Oh yeah, and take a look
on the other floors, too.
Here, take this.”

“This door is stuck wide open.
Better fix this right away.”

“This is the lounge floor.
Above us are the special floors for
the company big wigs.”{PAUSE}“It's tough working under someone.
It wears you out.”

“I thought I heard a ruckus
downstairs a minute ago.
Do you know what that was all about?”

“No idea.
But no need to worry because
everything above the
60th floor is safe.”

“What's keeping her?
Did she forget her keycard?”{PAUSE}“Even employees can't access floors
above the 60th
without a keycard.”

“I don't remember seeing your face before…
You new here?”{PAUSE}“Say, you're cute.
Let me teach you some…things.”
{CHOICE}Things?
{CHOICE}Um, I'm kinda in a hurry…

“Wipe that stupid look off your face.
I was only going to teach you
how to get to the next floor.”{PAUSE}“The higher ups in the company
use the floors above the 60th floor.
But you can't get there without
a keycard.”{PAUSE}“Get a keycard and you can use
the elevators freely.”

“…voila!
Hear that sound and
the door will open.”{PAUSE}“Just remember there are
different types of cards.
One keycard alone won't
let you go everywhere.”{PAUSE}“For example,{PAUSE}“'Keycard 60' only takes
you to the 60th floor.
'Keycard 65' only takes
you to the 65th floor.”{PAUSE}“It's a security system worthy of
Shinra. After all, they control
everything in Midgar and in the
world for that matter.”{PAUSE}“Oh, I have to go.
Gotta get back to work!”
